data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: Between 1250 and 1200 BC a staircase was built down a cleft in the rock to reach a protected water supply, in a similar way to ones at Mycenae. Unlike ____ Mycenaean ____, ____ as Mycenae and Pylos, ____ do ____ know ____ Athens ____ destruction ____ about 1200 BC, an ____ often ____ to a Dorian ____, ____ the ____ always ____ that ____ were `` pure '' Ionians ____ no ____ element. However, Athens, like many other Bronze Age settlements, went into economic decline for around 150 years following this.
data.partBlankContent: Between 1250 and 1200 BC a staircase was built down a cleft in the rock to reach a protected water supply, in a similar way to ones at Mycenae. Unlike ot___ Mycenaean cen____, su__ as Mycenae and Pylos, w_ do n__ know whe____ Athens suff____ destruction i_ about 1200 BC, an ev___ often attri_____ to a Dorian inva____, a__ the Athe_____ always maint_____ that th__ were `` pure '' Ionians wi__ no Dor___ element. However, Athens, like many other Bronze Age settlements, went into economic decline for around 150 years following this.
data.answer: 在公元前1250年到1200年之间，人们沿着岩石的裂缝建造了一座楼梯，以到达受保护的水源，类似于迈锡尼的方式。与迈锡尼和皮洛斯等其他迈锡尼中心不同，我们不知道雅典是否在公元前1200年左右遭受了破坏，这一事件通常被认为是多里安人的入侵造成的，雅典人一直坚称他们是“纯粹的”爱奥尼亚人，没有多里安人的元素。然而，雅典，像许多其他青铜时代的殖民地一样，在此后的150年里经济衰退。
